text:
Company: Hamilton and Sons

Job Title: Wage Subsidy Processing Clerk

About Us:
Hamilton and Sons is a leading financial services company committed to creating an inclusive and diverse workplace. We believe that our differences are what make us stronger, and we strive to create an environment where everyone feels valued and empowered to bring their authentic selves to work.

Job Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Wage Subsidy Processing Clerk to join our team. As a Wage Subsidy Processing Clerk, you will be responsible for processing wage subsidy claims, ensuring accuracy and timeliness, and providing exceptional customer service to our clients.

Responsibilities:

 Process wage subsidy claims in accordance with company policies and procedures
 Verify and validate claimant information and documentation
 Ensure accuracy and timeliness of claim processing
 Provide exceptional customer service to clients via phone, email, and in-person
 Collaborate with internal teams to resolve issues and improve processes

Qualifications and Experience:

 1-2 years of experience in a similar role
 Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
 Excellent communication and customer service skills
 Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines
 High school diploma or equivalent required; post-secondary education in a related field an asset

Perks and Benefits:

 We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from USD 40,000 to USD 50,000, based on your experience and skills.
 Comprehensive health and dental benefits
 Generous paid time off and holidays
 Opportunities for professional development and growth
 A dynamic and inclusive work environment that values diversity and promotes LGBTQ+ inclusion

We encourage LGBTQ+ candidates to apply and bring their authentic selves to our organisation. Our goal is to create a team that champions LGBTQ+ voices and experiences, and we value the rich experiences of LGBTQ+ individuals.
